dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and

libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems

dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
Creation and manipulation of parameter configuration spaces for
automated algorithm configuration and hyperparameter tuning.
dependencies.name: py-configspace

dependencies.description:
A Modified version of scikit-optimize a Sequential model-based
optimization toolbox for DeepHyper. Scikit-Optimize, or skopt, is a
simple and efficient library to minimize (very) expensive and noisy
black-box functions. It implements several methods for sequential model-
based optimization. skopt aims to be accessible and easy to use in many
contexts. The library is built on top of NumPy, SciPy and Scikit-Learn.
dependencies.name: py-dh-scikit-optimize

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependencies.name: py-ray

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description:
The Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) is a Synthetic Data Generation ecosystem
of libraries that allows users to easily learn single-table, multi-table
and timeseries datasets to later on generate new Synthetic Data that has
the same format and statistical properties as the original dataset.
dependencies.name: py-sdv

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Common interface for autotuning search space and method definition.
dependencies.name: py-ytopt-autotune

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Ytopt package implements search using Random Forest (SuRF), an
autotuning search method developed within Y-Tune ECP project.
name: py-ytopt
